channel.title: Godzrsps sponser application
channel.description:
IP: 178.32.252.34 or server.godzrsps.co.uk Port: 43594 Forums or website, if any: Both. [url=http://godzrsps.co.uk]godzrsps.co.uk[/url] 1. Do you sell anything on your server for real world or real runescape money or items? Such as items, levels, or mod or admin positions? Please state (generally) what you sell. : We don't do such things as that, since we don't want to get in that "runescape" stuff and we don't sell mods or admin positions since this server is supposed to be fair and that's why we don't sell it and people should earn it by showing loyalty.
2. What client version do you use? 317 or what? We've got two worlds, 317 and 718.
3. Do you offer an unsigned client people can use? ______
4. Do you require people to use your client? They don't have to use it, afteral we've got a webclient and a client for MAC pcs. and others.
5. Do you allow people to use the moparscape client on your server? Yes, if there's a problem with the webclient or the client, i do allow em to use moparscape client.
6. How much will you be willing to pay monthly through paypal? (minimum is $30, must go in increments of $5 up from there) I'm willing to pay 30
7. Do you accept donations? If so, what do you accept as donations? Yes, we accpet paypal and paysafecard.
Add any other info you feel relevant down here: About godzrsps
[center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/mbmuqh.png[/img]
At GodzRSPS our primary goal is to keep everything as realistic as possible. We offer you an amazing gameplay that you won't forget. That includes that there are no dupes, glitches or bugs at all and if there are any found they are fixed as soon as possible. You can enjoy the Divine X feeling together with a perfect eco system. Even the minor detail counts if you are coding a minigame or bosses, that's why we offer you perfection!
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]Website [url=http://www.godzrsps.co.uk]www.godzrsps.co.uk[/url] Download Client : [url=http://www.godzrsps.co.uk/godzv7.jar]http://www.godzrsps.co.uk/godzv7.jar[/url]
Owner Divine/Mike
Staff applications: Opened
Features: -24/7 VPS -500 CUSTOMS! LIKE AK-47,FLAMETORVA, -Custom NPC'S / BOSS! -Nex -SpongeBob -Pikachu -::vote / ::vote4reward -Flame Torva Set -Nex Armour -Custom Home -Great Donator Benfits -Nice Owners -Need Staff -Active Staff -Active Players -Fun to play! -New bosses teleports -FullScreen (Not done yet) -Fully Working specials -DonatorZone -PK'ing Teleports (Multi / Single) -Website -Forum -Fully working Download client (Mac too) -Webclient - Cash tickets - All skills working - 24/7 ON - Double XP Friday-Sunday - Auto Vote - DivineX Points (Points/NPC Kill) - Amazing Economy - Amazing Skilling & Combat - Custom Bosses - Professional/Experienced Staff - Unique combination of PvP and PvE gameplay Reminder: We have alot more features.
Media! [img]http://i.imgur.com/VLIvzLe.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/8522/gk53.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5QGT84R.png[/img]

item.title: Godzrsps sponser application
item.dc:creator: @DivineX DivineX
item.description:
@DivineX wrote:

IP: 178.32.252.34 or server.godzrsps.co.uk
Port: 43594
Forums or website, if any: Both. godzrsps.co.uk

  1. Do you sell anything on your server for real world or real runescape money or items? Such as items, levels, or mod or admin positions? Please state (generally) what you sell.
    : We don’t do such things as that, since we don’t want to get in that “runescape” stuff and we don’t sell mods or admin positions since this server is supposed to be fair and that’s why we don’t sell it and people should earn it by showing loyalty.

  2. What client version do you use? 317 or what?
    We’ve got two worlds, 317 and 718.

  3. Do you offer an unsigned client people can use?

  1. Do you require people to use your client?
    They don’t have to use it, afteral we’ve got a webclient and a client for MAC pcs. and others.

  2. Do you allow people to use the moparscape client on your server?
    Yes, if there’s a problem with the webclient or the client, i do allow em to use moparscape client.

  3. How much will you be willing to pay monthly through paypal? (minimum is $30, must go in increments of $5 up from there)
    I’m willing to pay 30

  4. Do you accept donations? If so, what do you accept as donations?
    Yes, we accpet paypal and paysafecard.

Add any other info you feel relevant down here:
About godzrsps

[center]

At GodzRSPS our primary goal is to keep everything as realistic as possible.
We offer you an amazing gameplay that you won’t forget.
That includes that there are no dupes, glitches or bugs at all and if there are any found they are fixed as soon as possible.
You can enjoy the Divine X feeling together with a perfect eco system.
Even the minor detail counts if you are coding a minigame or bosses, that’s why we offer you perfection!

Website www.godzrsps.co.uk
Download Client : http://www.godzrsps.co.uk/godzv7.jar
